item.title: This Thanksgiving, worry more about AI taking your job — and less about throwing money away on Black Friday
item.description: This Thanksgiving, give thanks if you still have a job.

item.title: My college-age kids inherited $300K from a 401(k). What should they do with this money?
item.description: “This money is likely to be saved for the purchase of homes in 10 years or so.”

item.title: Is Black Friday the best time to shop for a cruise? Here’s what experts have to say.
item.description: There are sales aplenty —and some extend through Cyber Monday and beyond.

item.title: The economy muddled along during the shutdown, the Fed found. Is another rate cut on tap?
item.description: Just two weeks before a pivotal meeting, the Federal Reserve said the U.S. economy has been just muddling along as of late.

item.title: Nvidia is going out of its way to rebut online criticism. Is this savvy PR or adding fuel to the fire?
item.description: Nvidia has been vocal in refuting budding criticisms, and there’s debate over the merits of its communications strategy.
